content: Hello everyone !Welcome to Unix Season game.Test your psychic abilities and guess what time of the year it was at the Unix-time number we guessed.Starting a new game, you are given a new value each time. Unix-time is a system for describing moments in time, adopted in Unix operating systems.For example, in a game, you are given a Unix-time number: 1,000,000,000, and the date corresponding to this number is September 9, 2001 - you do not know.Your task is to guess, given the Unix-time number, what season it was (Winter, Spring, Summer or Autumn).So the correct answer to the question "What was the time of the year when Unix time corresponded to the number 1,000,000,000" is Autumn.Let's play : @UnixSeasonbot
